version_description:
PIXAR'S COCO TAG TEAM EVENT!
The new limited-time Coco Tag Team Event has arrived in Disney Emoji Blitz! Pick two of your favorite emojis to play together to complete special challenges and unlock chests on the new Coco saga map!

NEW COCO EMOJIS!
Collect three all-new emojis including Miguel, Dante and the charming trickster, Héctor from Pixar's latest film, Coco!
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

BREAK THE ICE
Elsa & Anna need your help for a super cool Frozen challenge. Clear the ice off the board with matches & power-ups, to collect Arendelle’s most lovable lug, Kristoff!

SEASON’S MATCHINGS
Have you been good this year… at matching emojis? For a limited-time event, unlock holiday keyboard items!

A NEW YEAR’S BLAST
We’re gonna party like it’s 1928 in this challenging New Year’s event. Mickeys from every era want to keep fireworks from ‘sploding – to rake in points and items!

FLAMINGO CROQUET, ANYONE?

In a brand new Villain Event this January, join forces with Alice, Cheshire Cat, White Rabbit and the newest addition to Disney Emoji Blitz – the Mad Hatter – to defeat the Queen of Hearts and collect her exclusive emoji before it disappears down the rabbit hole.

INSIDE OUT SURVIVAL EVENT!
New emojis, Anger, Fear & Disgust are up for grabs - but first, you must save Riley’s happy memories, before the health bar runs out! Take control of YOUR mind’s “headquarters” to complete our most EMOTIONAL Survival Event, to date!

BREAK THE ICE
Elsa & Anna need your help for a super cool Frozen challenge. Clear the ice off the board with matches & power-ups, to collect Arendelle’s most lovable lug, Kristoff!

SEASON’S MATCHINGS
Have you been good this year… at matching emojis? For a limited-time event, unlock holiday keyboard items!

A NEW YEAR’S BLAST
We’re gonna party like it’s 1928 in this challenging New Year’s event. Mickeys from every era want to keep fireworks from ‘sploding – to rake in points and items!

FLAMINGO CROQUET, ANYONE?

In a brand new Villain Event this January, join forces with Alice, Cheshire Cat, White Rabbit and the newest addition to Disney Emoji Blitz – the Mad Hatter – to defeat the Queen of Hearts and collect her exclusive emoji before it disappears down the rabbit hole.

BIG HEROES WANTED
Baymax and Hiro are here to save the day in our brand new Big Hero 6 Tag Team Event! Blast the board with double the emoji power, switching characters MID GAME (even ones outside your collection)!

WELCOME ROSE GOLD MINNIE & PRINCESS TIANA
Collect an exclusive Rose Gold Minnie emoji, during the brand-new “Rock the Dots” Event. And that's not all - Retro Minnie's back, too! The action continues, with an enchanting Princess Challenge. Play with Jasmine, Rapunzel or royalty’s latest addition, Princess Tiana!

COLLECT VALENTINE’S ITEMS AND EMOJIS
Add Valentine’s-themed Emoji Items to your keyboard, and collect those spaghetti-smooching-pooches, Lady and the Tramp. The all-new Valentine’s Event is here!

JOIN THE WINTER GAMES TAG TEAM EVENT
Unlock HERCULES in the Winter Games Event. Superhuman strength, flowing golden locks, and some say, the ULTIMATE Tag Team partner!

PLAY A NEW COCO CHALLENGE
Join Hector, Miguel and Dante in the Land of the Dead! A brand-new Coco Challenge is coming your way!

DEFEAT JAFAR, COLLECT ABU!
It’s time to wield the majestic power of the Genie’s lamp, to foil Jafar’s sinister schemes! Aladdin, Jafar, Jasmine and Rajah are all available to collect, as well as an BRAND NEW Abu emoji.

COLLECT SOME CHEEKY CHIPMUNKS!
Calling all collectors, the all-new Disney Afternoon Item Card Event is NOW LIVE! Better hold onto your feathers, Launchpad McQuack, Darkwing Duck and Scrooge McDuck are here to shake things up, joined by emoji newcomers, the Rescue Rangers Chip ’n Dale!

FOOD FIGHT FACE-OFF ARRIVES!
Prepare to play against Blitzers around the world, in the first-ever, three-day event. DESTROY opponents with deviously delicious treats! CRUSH them with cute colorful confections! As if that wasn’t sweet enough, you can earn Vanellope von Schweetz!

INSIDE OUT SURVIVAL EVENT!
New emojis, Anger, Fear & Disgust are up for grabs - but first, you must save Riley’s happy memories, before the health bar runs out! Take control of YOUR mind’s “headquarters” to complete our most EMOTIONAL Survival Event, to date!

WELCOME LILO TO THE BLITZ OHANA!
Lilo and Stitch are surfing into Disney Emoji Blitz! Wash away the board, and Clear the Sand to win prizes during this week-long event!

ROYALTY HAS ARRIVED!
Are you up for a challenge? Complete missions and win prizes with this new princess trio! Merida, Pocahontas and Aurora are all in the Diamond Box!

SWEET LIKE HONEY!
We have a treat for you! 1-day Diamond Box featuring Pooh, Tigger & Eeyore! Round out your collection with Rabbit!

WELCOME LILO TO THE BLITZ OHANA!
Lilo and Stitch are surfing into Disney Emoji Blitz! Wash away the board, and Clear the Sand to win prizes during this week-long event!

ROYALTY HAS ARRIVED!
Are you up for a challenge? Complete missions and win prizes with this new princess trio! Merida, Pocahontas and Aurora are all in the Diamond Box!

SWEET LIKE HONEY!
We have a treat for you! 1-day Diamond Box featuring Pooh, Tigger & Eeyore! Round out your collection with Rabbit!
The charming bandit, Flynn Rider and the palace horse, Maximus, have arrived! Things are about to get hairy with them joining Rapunzel and Pascal in the Diamond Box!

We’re celebrating a galaxy from far, far away! Collect a light side emoji just by opening the app on May 4th! Then, be sure to round out your Star Wars collection with a Diamond Box purchase, and by completing the Magic Key Rewards May 4th-6th! Rey, Finn and BB-8 emojis could all be yours!

GET COOKIN' AND WIN REMY FROM RATATOUILLE!
Food Fight Face-Off is back with plenty of sweet treats coming your way! Compete in the sugary showdown and collect our cutest little chef, Remy!

COLLECT HADES
To defeat Hades, God-like strength is a must in the latest Villain Event. Collect shields as they drop to the bottom of the board. All-new Meg and Pegasus are joining Hercules in the Diamond Box.

EMPERORS, LLAMAS AND SQUIRRELS - OH MY!
The all-new Emperor's New Groove Item Card Event is here! Complete the 5-day event for your chance to pull either Kronk or Kuzco out of the Diamond Box.

YOUR ROYAL HIGHNESS, TIANA, HAS RETURNED!
Calling all culinary experts! Get cookin' in the latest 3-day Food Fight Face-Off Event! Compete against Blitzers around the world for your chance to win Princess Tiana!

EMPERORS, LLAMAS AND SQUIRRELS - OH MY!
The all-new Emperor's New Groove Item Card Event is here! Complete the 5-day event for your chance to pull either Kronk or Kuzco out of the Diamond Box.

YOUR ROYAL HIGHNESS, TIANA, HAS RETURNED!
Calling all culinary experts! Get cookin' in the latest 3-day Food Fight Face-Off Event! Compete against Blitzers around the world for your chance to win Princess Tiana!

START YOUR ENGINES!
Speed into Emoji and race through our latest Cars Challenge! Be sure to collect some of your favorite Cars emojis-Lightning, Cruz and Jackson, during the Pixar Giveaway!

CLEAR THE CLOVERS!
The food-lovin' caterpillar, Heimlich, just crawled in! Complete the event to win this Gold Box exclusive from A Bug's Life.

UNLOCK BING BONG!
Who's your pal who likes to play? Round out your Inside Out collection with Bing Bong, as the group collection prize, starting June 14th!

INCREDIBLE NEWS!
Disney Emoji Blitz just got even MORE super with 3 new characters from Disney•Pixar's Incredibles 2! Over the next 5 days, suit up and test your skills in a special survival mode. Be sure to complete the Survival Event to win Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl or Jack-Jack from the Diamond Box!

JUST KEEP SWIMMING
The Finding Nemo Tag Team Event is here! Pick two of your favorite emojis to play together, complete special missions, unlock chests and win prizes!

FOOOD FIIIGHHHT
Prepare for more food-based competition as Food Fight Face-Off returns! Complete the 3-day event to win Remy from Ratatouille!

CRUELLA RETURNS
Complete the 101 Dalmatians Item Card Event to collect Cruella De Vil as the final prize! Perdita also joins a few other puppy pals in the the Diamond Box!

DEFEAT THE EVIL QUEEN
Who will be the fairest of them all? Finish the 5-day Villain Event to collect The Evil Queen! After, complete Rainbow Falls and win a Diamond Box to collect Snow White, Dopey or Magic Mirror!

UNLOCK SPIRIT MUFASA
Round out your Lion King collection with Spirit Mufasa, as the group collection prize, starting July 10th!

FOOOD FIIIGHHHT
Competition continues as Food Fight Face-Off returns! Complete the 2-day event to win the exclusive, King Triton!

2 BLITZ-TASTIC YEARS
Help us celebrate our 2-year anniversary by opening your game on both July 13th and 14th to collect a FREE Emoji each day! Steamboat Willie, Retro Minnie and Oswald are all available. Then, be sure to use your collected emojis during the 3-day Retro Challenge, July 13th - 15th!

HAPPY WORLD EMOJI DAY
Launch your game on July 17th for a gift from us to you! Now is your chance to collect 1 worldly emoji from the Giveaway Box: Mulan, Miguel, Moana, Kristoff or Aladdin!

PREPARE FOR ADVENTURE
Play with 2 of your favorite adventurers during this week's Rescuers Team Event and win Bianca or Bernard!

CHRISTMAS IN JULY!
Get in the holiday spirit this summer by completing our Item Card Event to collect either Holiday Mickey or Holiday Minnie!

OO-DE-LALLY!
Robin Hood just snuck in—finish the 4-day Food Fight Event to collect him!

TA-DAH
Pull Sorcerer's Apprentice Mickey from the Diamond Box by completing our Fantasia Item Card Event! No magic required.

NEW VILLAIN IN TOWN!
Defeat Magica de Spell during the 5-day Villain Event and win this EXCLUSIVE evil sorceress as the final prize! All-new Webby and Gizmoduck are joining Scrooge and Launchpad in the DuckTales Diamond Box! Now is your chance to collect a few new quacky emojis!

YEEHAW!
Have you heard all the buzz? Bullseye and Jessie have joined our Emoji collection! First, be sure to finish the 3-day Toy Story Challenge —Bullseye, Woody and Buzz are all available to pull from the Diamond Box. Then, complete the 5-day Clear the Tumbleweeds Event to collect your prize, a Diamond Box, featuring the all-new Jessie and Bullseye along with Buzz, Woody and Alien!

Børk Børk Børk
Here's a savory treat—Food Fight Face-Off is back with the master of kitchen disaster—the Swedish Chef! Complete our 3-day event to collect the newest cook in the Disney Emoji Blitz kitchen!

Calling All Supers!
Disney Emoji Blitz just got 2 new SUPER additions from Disney•Pixar's Incredibles 2 - Dash and Violet! Over the next 5 days, suit up and test your skills in the Incredibles 2 Challenge. All new Dash and Violet are joining Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl and EXCLUSIVE Jack-Jack in the Diamond Box. Now you can play with the entire Parr Family, no capes required!

FOOD FIGHT IS BACK
Complete the 3-day event to collect the new & exclusive Mr. Toad!

HEROES NEEDED
Defeat The Queen of Hearts & Captain Hook in 1-day Villain Events in preparation for the Villain Challenge starting 10/5!

WINIFRED IS FLYING IN
Finish the Halloween Item Card Event for your chance to get Winifred, Hatbox Ghost, Abominable Snowman, Leota or Bride from the Diamond Box- no witchcraft required!

WELCOME CELIA & ROZ
Complete the Monsters, Inc. Challenge with these 2 new emojis!

Hey blitzers! You'll FALL in love with our events for Halloween, Dia De Los Muertos and the start of November!

- MALEFICENT MULTI-MAP EVENT: October 17-21
- HALLOWEEN GIVEAWAY: October 19-31
- MICKEY'S HALLOWEEN AT THE PARK CHALLENGE: October 24-27
- HALLOWEEN COSTUMES ITEM EVENT: October 30-31
- ELSA'S SNOW-VEMBER SAGA: November 1-30
- COCO MULTI-MAP EVENT: November 1-4

TALE AS OLD AS TIME
Gaston's Quest For Love is the first-ever, month-long Token Quest, and features new ways to collect emojis, with exciting prizes along the way!

A SPOONFUL OF SUGAR
Mary Poppins and Bert make their debut in the Mary Poppins Clear Event, September 5-8!

THE PUR-FECT TIME TO POUNCE
Play with NEW Figaro, Clawhauser, Cheshire Cat, and Marie in the Cats Challenge, September 12-15!

DISNEY MAGIC
Win the all-new Figment emoji during the Disney Parks Worldwide Item Card Event, live August 1 - 5!

GHOST HOSTS
Play the Haunted Mansion Survival Event for a chance to pull Hatbox Ghost, Madame Leota, or The Bride for the Diamond Box, live August 6-7th!

DISNEY MAGIC
Win the all-new Figment emoji during the Disney Parks Worldwide Item Card Event, live August 1 - 5!

GHOST HOSTS
Play the Haunted Mansion Survival Event for a chance to pull Hatbox Ghost, Madame Leota, or The Bride for the Diamond Box, live August 6-7th!

HE CAN FLY!
Play the Dumbo Team Event, 3/28 - 4/1! Complete the event to collect Dumbo or all-new Timothy Mouse!

NEED A HERO?
Hercules, Megara, & Pegasus have your back in the latest Challenge, 5/5—7!

RING THE BELL
Don't miss The Hunchback of Notre Dame Survival Event with Quasimodo, Hugo, & Esmeralda, 4/11—14!

HUNGRY?
Collect the Swedish Chef by completing the 2-day Food Fight Event, 4/16—17!

Blitz Like The Wind
All-new Meeko & Flit join Pocahontas in the Pocahontas Clear Event, 4/18—21!

SUPER NEW EVENT
Soar into the Incredibles Clear Event from 6/13 - 6/16!

TOY STORY GIVEAWAYS
Enjoy 9 days of Toy Story Giveaway Boxes, starting 6/16!

BO PEEP & FORKY ARE HERE!
Don't miss the 1-day Toy Story Challenge on 6/19 & the 1-day Toy Story Clear Event on 6/20! Then, giddy up for the Toy Story 4 Item Card Event from 6/21 - 24!

EVEN MORE PIXAR
Round out the month with a Heimlich Food Fight (6/26-27), A B

BEWARE THE SHADOW MAN
Play the Dr. Facilier Villain Event from 3/5 – 3/10! Plus, pull all-new Louis, new & exclusive Ray, or Tiana from the Diamond Box!

CLEAR THE DARKNESS!
Clear event is live with all-new & exclusive Kingdom Hearts emojis! Now through 1/20, clear darkness from the gameboard to close portals and collect keyblades! Complete the event to win a Diamond Box featuring the 2 new & exclusive emojis - Sora and Aqua!

CELEBRATE POLKA DOT DAY!
Rose Gold Minnie returns in the latest Item Card Event - live 1/25. Blitz your way through the event to collect a Diamond Box featuring Minnie, Rose Gold Minnie & Retro Minnie!

Adventure awaits! Finish the 3-day Survival Event to add Carl, Russell or Dug to your collection!

On Lunar New Year, 2/5, collect or level up Pua, Piglet or Pumbaa, for FREE!

Finish the 4-day Robin Hood Team Event for your chance to win the all-new Maid Marian!

From 2/12 - 2/14, open your game for lovely giveaways! Starting 2/14, pull Gaston from the Diamond Box & use him to complete the Villain-tines challenge!

Starting 2/26, complete the 2-day Food Fight Event & win Clawhauser!

The Ralph Breaks the Internet Team Event is here! Play as two emojis to complete team missions and unlock chests on the prize map! Starting 11/23, pull emojis from the Team Box to speed up your progress and be sure to complete the 5-day event to win a Diamond Box featuring Ralph, Yesss and the sweet Vanellope! No password required

BOO!
Oogie Boogie is here to fill your gameboard to the brim with fright! Now through 10/31, pull Zero from the Diamond Box & use him against the newest villain!

NO TRICKS, JUST TREATS!
Happy Halloween, Blitzers! Launch your game on 10/31 for a FREE EMOJI - collect Jack or Sally!

GEAR UP FOR ADVENTURE!
Strum along with Miguel, Héctor, Dante & all-new Imelda! Coco Challenge begins 11/2!

FOOD FIGHT RETURNS!
Starting 11/9, complete the 3-day event to collect the exclusive Heimlich!

Starting 11/15, clear frosting from your gameboard to collect birthday cakes, win prizes and progress through the event map. Complete the Clear the Frosting Event to win Steamboat Willie Mickey, Sorcerer's Apprentice Mickey or new and EXCLUSIVE Rainbow Mickey!

On 11/18, be sure to launch your game to open Mickey's 90th Anniversary Box - full of free coins, gems and lives! On the same day, Minnie, Mickey, Goofy, Pluto, Daisy and Donald will be available to pull from the Celebration Box!

The Ralph Breaks the Internet Team Event is here! Play as two emojis to complete team missions and unlock chests on the prize map! Starting 11/23, pull emojis from the Team Box to speed up your progress and be sure to complete the 5-day event to win a Diamond Box featuring Ralph, Yesss and the sweet Vanellope! No password required

DRIVE OUT DARKNESS!
Calling all Padawans, the Darth Vader Villain Event is LIVE. For a limited time, pull the all-new Princess Leia and Luke Skywalker emojis from the Diamond Box and use them to double the impact of your attack against Darth Vader. Complete the event to add the newest dark side emoji to your collection! From 12/1 - 12/3, Rey, Finn, BB-8 and Kylo Ren are available to pull from the Star Wars Box!

25 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS IS LIVE
Open your game every day, now though Christmas, for a free gift!

SURVIVAL EVENT
Test your skills during the Snow White Survival Event, starting 12/13. Magic Mirror returns to the Diamond Box & could be added to your collection!

JACK-JACK IS BACK
Win the exclusive emoji by completing the 2-Day Food Fight Event starting 12/19.

'TIS THE SEASON
Disney Parks Holiday Item Card Event is live 12/21 - Finish the event & win a Diamond Box featuring a holiday exclusive!

25 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS IS LIVE
Open your game every day, now though Christmas, for a free gift!

SURVIVAL EVENT
Test your skills during the Snow White Survival Event, starting 12/13. Magic Mirror returns to the Diamond Box & could be added to your collection!

JACK-JACK IS BACK
Win the exclusive emoji by completing the 2-Day Food Fight Event starting 12/19.

'TIS THE SEASON
Disney Parks Holiday Item Card Event is live 12/21 - Finish the event & win a Diamond Box featuring a holiday exclusive!

25 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS IS LIVE
Open your game every day, now though Christmas, for a free gift!

SURVIVAL EVENT
Test your skills during the Snow White Survival Event, starting 12/13. Magic Mirror returns to the Diamond Box & could be added to your collection!

JACK-JACK IS BACK
Win the exclusive emoji by completing the 2-Day Food Fight Event starting 12/19.

'TIS THE SEASON
Disney Parks Holiday Item Card Event is live 12/21 - Finish the event & win a Diamond Box featuring a holiday exclusive!

Your Wishes Came True!
Pull the newest emoji, Pinocchio, from the Diamond Box & use him during the Duos Challenge, live 1/4 - 1/7.

Scary Good News!
The Monsters, Inc. Group Collection launches on 1/8 along with a 1-day Diamond Box! If you haven't already, be sure to max out Sulley, Mike, Randall, Celia & Roz to receive Boo as the final reward!

Travel to The Underworld!
To defeat Hades, godlike strength is a must! Complete the 4-day Villain Event starting 1/11 & win the exclusive Hades!

CLEAR THE DARKNESS!
Clear event is live with all-new & exclusive Kingdom Hearts emojis! Now through 1/20, clear darkness from the gameboard to close portals and collect keyblades! Complete the event to win a Diamond Box featuring the 2 new & exclusive emojis - Sora and Aqua!

CELEBRATE POLKA DOT DAY!
Rose Gold Minnie returns in the latest Item Card Event - live 1/25. Blitz your way through the event to collect a Diamond Box featuring Minnie, Rose Gold Minnie & Retro Minnie!

Adventure awaits! Finish the 3-day Survival Event to add Carl, Russell or Dug to your collection!

On Lunar New Year, 2/5,  collect or level up Pua, Piglet or Pumbaa, for FREE!

Finish the 4-day Robin Hood Team Event  for your chance to win the all-new Maid Marian!

From 2/12 - 2/14, open your game for lovely giveaways! Starting 2/14, pull Gaston from the Diamond Box & use him to complete the Villain-tines challenge!

Starting 2/26, complete the 2-day Food Fight  Event & win Clawhauser!

Adventure awaits! Finish the 3-day Survival Event to add Carl, Russell or Dug to your collection!

On Lunar New Year, 2/5, collect or level up Pua, Piglet or Pumbaa, for FREE!

Finish the 4-day Robin Hood Team Event for your chance to win the all-new Maid Marian!

From 2/12 - 2/14, open your game for lovely giveaways! Starting 2/14, pull Gaston from the Diamond Box & use him to complete the Villain-tines challenge!

Starting 2/26, complete the 2-day Food Fight Event & win Clawhauser!

BEWARE THE SHADOW MAN
Play the Dr. Facilier Villain Event from 3/5 – 3/10! Plus, pull all-new Louis, new & exclusive Ray, or Tiana from the Diamond Box!

HE CAN FLY!
Play the Dumbo Team Event, 3/28 - 4/1! Complete the event to collect Dumbo or all-new Timothy Mouse!

NEED A HERO?
Hercules, Megara, & Pegasus have your back in the latest Challenge, 5/5—7!

RING THE BELL
Don't miss The Hunchback of Notre Dame Survival Event with Quasimodo, Hugo, & Esmeralda, 4/11—14!

HUNGRY?
Collect the Swedish Chef by completing the 2-day Food Fight Event, 4/16—17!

Blitz Like The Wind
All-new Meeko & Flit join Pocahontas in the Pocahontas Clear Event, 4/18—21!

RING THE GONG!
Play the Mulan Team Event, 4/25—4/28! Complete the event to collect Mulan, Mushu, or all-new Crik-Kee!

FULFILL YOUR DESTINY...
Battle against the dark side in the Kylo Ren Villain Event, 5/1—5/3. Complete the event to add Kylo Ren to your collection!

MAY THE FOURTH BE WITH YOU
Launch your game on 5/4 to collect one free Star Wars emoji!

UP FOR A CHALLENGE?
Play with Rey, Finn, BB-8, Luke Skywalker, or Princess Leia emojis in the Star Wars Challenge, 5/4—5/6!

RING THE GONG!
Play the Mulan Team Event, 4/25—4/28! Complete the event to collect Mulan, Mushu, or all-new Crik-Kee!
FULFILL YOUR DESTINY...
Battle against the dark side in the Kylo Ren Villain Event, 5/1—5/3. Complete the event to add Kylo Ren to your collection!

MAY THE FOURTH BE WITH YOU
Launch your game on 5/4 to collect one free Star Wars emoji!

UP FOR A CHALLENGE?
Play with Rey, Finn, BB-8, Luke Skywalker, or Princess Leia emojis in the Star Wars Challenge, 5/4—5/6!

SAY CHEESE!
Play the Disney Afternoon Item Card Event, 5/10—13! Gadget & Monterey Jack join Chip & Dale in the Diamond Box!

HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY!
Open your game on 5/12 for a special treat!

MIRROR, MIRROR
Defeat the Evil Queen in the newest Villain Event, 5/17—20! All-new Grumpy & The Prince emojis are in the Diamond Box.

MAKE A WISH
Complete the Aladdin Clear the Sand Event to collect Aladdin, Jasmine, Genie, Abu, or all-new Iago, 5/23—25! Then, play the Aladdin Challenge, 5/26—28!

IT’S PIXAR MONTH!
Open your game for a Pixar Giveaway Box on 6/1!

JUST KEEP SWIMMING
Don’t forget to play the Finding Dory Item Card Event, 5/31—6/2! Bailey & Destiny join Dory, Nemo, & Hank in the Diamond Box!

ADVENTURE IS OUT THERE!
Compete against Blitzers in Russell’s Food Fight Face-Off, 6/5—6!

ALL THE FEELS
Complete the Inside Out Survival Event, 6/7—10, to collect a Diamond Box with Joy, Anger, Fear, Disgust, Sadness, or new & exclusive Rainbow Unicorn!

SUPER NEW EVENT
Soar into the Incredibles Clear Event from 6/13 - 6/16!

TOY STORY GIVEAWAYS
Enjoy 9 days of Toy Story Giveaway Boxes, starting 6/16!

BO PEEP & FORKY ARE HERE!
Don't miss the 1-day Toy Story Challenge on 6/19 & the 1-day Toy Story Clear Event on 6/20! Then, giddy up for the Toy Story 4 Item Card Event from 6/21 - 24!

EVEN MORE PIXAR
Round out the month with a Heimlich Food Fight (6/26-27), A Bug's Life Clear Event (6/28-29), & a Coco Tag Team Event (6/30-7/1)!

SUPER NEW EVENT
Soar into the Incredibles Clear Event from 6/13 - 6/16!

TOY STORY GIVEAWAYS
Enjoy 9 days of Toy Story Giveaway Boxes, starting 6/16!

BO PEEP & FORKY ARE HERE!
Don't miss the 1-day Toy Story Challenge on 6/19 & the 1-day Toy Story Clear Event on 6/20! Then, giddy up for the Toy Story 4 Item Card Event from 6/21 - 24!

EVEN MORE PIXAR
Round out the month with a Heimlich Food Fight (6/26-27), A Bug's Life Clear Event (6/28-29), & a Coco Tag Team Event (6/30-7/1)!

SUPER NEW EVENT
Soar into the Incredibles Clear Event from 6/13 - 6/16!

TOY STORY GIVEAWAYS
Enjoy 9 days of Toy Story Giveaway Boxes, starting 6/16!

BO PEEP & FORKY ARE HERE!
Don't miss the 1-day Toy Story Challenge on 6/19 & the 1-day Toy Story Clear Event on 6/20! Then, giddy up for the Toy Story 4 Item Card Event from 6/21 - 24!

EVEN MORE PIXAR
Round out the month with a Heimlich Food Fight (6/26-27), A B

Soar into the Incredibles Clear Event from 6/13 - 6/16!

Enjoy 9 days of Toy Story Giveaway Boxes, starting 6/16!

BO PEEP & FORKY ARE HERE!
Don't miss the 1-day Toy Story Challenge on 6/19 & the 1-day Toy Story Clear Event on 6/20! Then, giddy up for the Toy Story 4 Item Card Event from 6/21 - 24!

EVEN MORE PIXAR
Round out the month with a Heimlich Food Fight (6/26-27), A B

MARVELOUSLY MAD
Defeat Madam Mim in the newest Villain Event, live 7/4-8! Plus, all-new Merlin, Arthur & Archimedes emojis are available to pull from the Diamond Box!

3 YEARS OF BLITZ
Celebrate our 3-year anniversary with giveaways from 7/8-16!

A ROYAL AFFAIR
Prince Eric makes his royal debut in the Prince Challenge, live 7/11-14!

MAGIC KEY CELEBRATION
Play the 2-day event to win prizes, live 7/16-17!

HAPPY WORLD EMOJI DAY
Launch your game on 7/17 to receive one free emoji!

THE KING RETURNS
Play The Lion King Survival Event, live 7/18-22! All-new Nala & Shenzi are available to pull from the Diamond Box!

SEASONS GREETINGS
Complete the Summer Holiday Item Card event to collect a Diamond Box with Holiday Mickey, Holiday Minnie or Holiday Pluto, live 7/24-25!

CLEAR THE INK
Complete the Clear the Ink event from 7/26-29 to collect a Diamond Box with Rainbow Mickey, Rose Gold Minnie, Steamboat Willie, Retro Minnie or Oswald!

SUPER NEW EVENT
Soar into the Incredibles Clear Event from 6/13 - 6/16!

TOY STORY GIVEAWAYS
Enjoy 9 days of Toy Story Giveaway Boxes, starting 6/16!

BO PEEP & FORKY ARE HERE!
Don't miss the 1-day Toy Story Challenge on 6/19 & the 1-day Toy Story Clear Event on 6/20! Then, giddy up for the Toy Story 4 Item Card Event from 6/21 - 24!

EVEN MORE PIXAR
Round out the month with a Heimlich Food Fight (6/26-27), A Bug's Life Clear Event (6/28-29), & a Coco Tag Team Event (6/30-7/1)!

DISNEY MAGIC
Win the all-new Figment emoji during the Disney Parks Worldwide Item Card Event, live August 1 - 5!

GHOST HOSTS
Play the Haunted Mansion Survival Event for a chance to pull Hatbox Ghost, Madame Leota, or The Bride for the Diamond Box, live August 6-7th!

DISNEY MAGIC
Win the all-new Figment emoji during the Disney Parks Worldwide Item Card Event, live August 1 - 5!

GHOST HOSTS
Play the Haunted Mansion Survival Event for a chance to pull Hatbox Ghost, Madame Leota, or The Bride for the Diamond Box, live August 6-7th!

STAY SHINY
Play the first ever Moana Event to win Tamatoa, live August 23 - 26!

SO THIS IS LOVE
Prince Charming and Gus make their debut in the Cinderella Item Card Event, live August 29 - September 1!B35

TALE AS OLD AS TIME
Gaston's Quest For Love is the first-ever, month-long Token Quest, and features new ways to collect emojis, with exciting prizes along the way!

A SPOONFUL OF SUGAR
Mary Poppins and Bert make their debut in the Mary Poppins Clear Event, September 5-8!

THE PUR-FECT TIME TO POUNCE
Play with NEW Figaro, Clawhauser, Cheshire Cat, and Marie in the Cats Challenge, September 12-15!
